title: Inapproximability of sufficient reasons for decision trees. (arXiv:2304.02781v1 [cs.CC])
abstract: In this note, we establish the hardness of approximation of the problem of computing the minimal size of a $\delta$-sufficient reason for decision trees.
context:
Title: Inapproximability of sufficient reasons for decision trees. (arXiv:2304.02781v1 [cs.CC])
Abstract: In this note, we establish the hardness of approximation of the problem of computing the minimal size of a $\delta$-sufficient reason for decision trees.
translated_title: 决策树的充分原因问题的近似难度
translated_abstract: 本文证明了计算决策树的$\delta$-充分原因的最小大小的问题的近似难度。
tldr: 本文研究了决策树的充分原因问题，并证明了该问题的近似难度。
en_tdlr: This paper studies the problem of sufficient reasons for decision trees and proves its hardness of approximation.
